text: Geza inkuru nziza kuri babandi bemeye bakanakora ibikorwa byiza, ko bazagororerwa ubusitani butembamo imigezi (Ijuru). Buri uko bazajya bafungurirwamo imbuto, bazajya bavuga bati"Izi ni zo twafungurirwaga mbere", ndetse bazazihabwa zisa (nkâ€™izo baryaga ku isi ariko zitandukanye mu buryohe). Bazanagororerwamo abagore basukuye, kandi bazanabubamo ubuziraherezo
